graphics

Class TurtleGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphics.TurtleGraphics

  • public class TurtleGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class calcuates how the L-system will appear on a digital canvas.
    Author:
    Benhur J. Tadiparti
